title: Mark Levin Midterm Election Special - Part One
description:
On a special podcast only edition of the Mark Levin Show, the things that were done in 2020 must not be done in 2022 or 2024, or we can't get an honest and fair election. We can't afford to lose this election or the next one. And it's not about so much the Republican party or even the candidates. It's about our country. It's about our future. Mitch McConnell is a bureaucrat. Mitch McConnell is worse than a RINO. He is a big spending, big bureaucrat Republican. Gavin Newsom runs a few phony commercial, and he's talking about freedom that he would bring freedom to the rest of the country. Gavin Newsom is incapable of bringing freedom. It's time for the Republicans to make advances, time for the Republicans to promote liberty.

Follow Mark Levin on Twitter, Truth Social, Gettr and Parler: @marklevinshow
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
